programme.title: Carly Simon: No Secrets
programme.desc: A look at Carly Simons 1972 album No Secrets explores its connections to the singer-songwriters life and work, from her relationships to the creative process of making each track.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: A huntsman and a fellow warrior help an ice queen battle the evil sister who betrayed her.

programme.title: Blood for Dust
programme.desc: Travelling salesman Cliff is drowning under the weight of providing for his family and finds himself on a dangerous path after a chance encounter with a colleague who has a dark past. Desperate to keep his fragile home life intact, Cliff agrees to partner with Ricky and run cocaine across Montana.

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: In 14th Century Switzerland, a once peaceful hunter leads his people in rebellion after his family and country are threatened by a tyrannical Austrian King. As the Holy Roman Empire crumbles, the quiet lives of the Swiss peasants are upended.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother to protect their kingdom and save the world from destruction.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises to combat massive, malevolent foes that have been feeding on a nuclear plants reactors and now threaten mankind with total annihilation.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: Fuelled by his restored faith in humanity, and inspired by Supermans selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists newfound ally Diana Prince to face an even greater threat. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to recruit a team to stand against this newly-awakened enemy. Despite the formation of an unprecedented league of heroes in Batman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Cyborg and the Flash, it may be too late to save the planet from an assault of catastrophic proportions.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: Billy Batson is a streetwise 14-year-old who can magically transform into the adult superhero Shazam simply by shouting out one word. His newfound powers soon get put to the test when he squares off against the evil Dr. Thaddeus Sivana.

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: A half-human, half-vampire superhero hunts down the brutal bloodsucking creature who infected his mother.

Stylish historical epic retelling the fierce battle at Thermopylae in 481BC. The Spartan king, Leonidas, and his tiny army of 300 followers provided inspiration for the whole of Greece as they fought the massed ranks of the Persian army whose commander, King Xerxes, had up to a million warriors at his disposal.

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: In 14th Century Switzerland, a once peaceful hunter leads his people in rebellion after his family and country are threatened by a tyrannical Austrian King. As the Holy Roman Empire crumbles, the quiet lives of the Swiss peasants are upended.

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: In 14th Century Switzerland, a once peaceful hunter leads his people in rebellion after his family and country are threatened by a tyrannical Austrian King. As the Holy Roman Empire crumbles, the quiet lives of the Swiss peasants are upended.

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Two rogues stumble across a map of the treasures of El Dorado and stow away on an explorers ship bound for South America, where they are mistaken for gods due to their foreign complexions. Narrated by Elton John, who provided the music to Tim Rices lyrics.

programme.title: Boonie Bears: Guardian Code
programme.desc: Briar and Bramble lose their mother at a very young age under mysterious circumstances. Many years later, logger Vick takes the bears to visit the Robot Research Institute, and they uncover a clue relating to their mother.

programme.title: Deep Sea
programme.desc: Swept into the sea during a family cruise, a young girl named Shenxiu stumbles upon a mysterious restaurant under the waves. There, she meets the scheming head chef and his ragtag crew of adorable otters and sarcastic walruses.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: Red, Chuck, Bomb and the rest of their feathered friends are surprised when a green pig suggests that they put aside their differences and unite to fight a common threat. Aggressive birds from an island covered in ice are planning to use an elaborate weapon to destroy the fowl and swine way of life. After picking their best and brightest, the birds and pigs come up with a scheme to infiltrate the island, deactivate the device and return to their respective paradises intact.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A pig, a mouse, a porcupine, a gorilla, an elephant and other animals gather at a koalas theatre for a singing competition.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: An opportunistic raccoon teaches fellow animals about the edible treasures that the new humans in the neighbourhood conveniently leave outdoors.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Flightless birds lead a mostly happy existence, except for Red, who just cant get past the daily annoyances of life. His temperament leads him to anger management class, where he meets fellow misfits Chuck and Bomb. Red becomes even more agitated when his feathered brethren welcome green pigs to their island paradise. As the swine begin to get under his skin, Red joins forces with Chuck and Bomb to investigate the real reason behind their mysterious arrival.

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: A family of ducks decides to leave the safety of a New England pond for an adventurous trip to Jamaica. However, their well-laid plans quickly go awry when they get lost and wind up in New York City.

programme.title: Despicable Me 2
programme.desc: Just as Gru settles into his new role as a suburban family man, the ultrasecret Anti-Villain League sends him on a mission to nab the perpetrator of a spectacular heist.

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: Winter sprite Jack Frost must save the day when an evil boogeyman schemes to stop the worlds children from believing in Santa Claus, the Easter Bunny and other immortal Guardians.

programme.title: Dr. Seuss the Lorax
programme.desc: A young boy searches for a way to gain the affections of his dream-girl. In his quest he learns that in order to succeed he must uncover the story of the grumpy but nature-loving Lorax.

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: A feature-length spin-off from the TV series, the Thornberry family - led by natural history film-maker Colonel Radcliff Thornberry - head to deepest Africa. Once there, daughter Eliza - after meeting a shaman - can talk to the animals, a skill that stands her in good stead to foil a dastardly plot by poachers to kill a herd of elephants for their ivory.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: Otis the cow is a wild-living party animal and just loves to dance until dawn, but then his dad is killed by coyotes, and Otis has to become the responsible leader of the rest of the all-singing, all-dancing farm animals.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Concerned that his half-human grandson isnt showing his vampire side, Dracula and his friends put the boy through a `monster-in-training boot camp just as Dracs old-school father decides to pay a visit.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Concerned that his half-human grandson isnt showing his vampire side, Dracula and his friends put the boy through a `monster-in-training boot camp just as Dracs old-school father decides to pay a visit.

programme.title: Swede Caroline
programme.desc: As Caroline readies herself for the championship, the competitive giant vegetable-growing world is rocked by scandal. Her prized marrow plants are stolen, and her life turns upside down, so she hires two private detectives.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Axel Foley and his Beverly Hills buddies investigate criminal activities at a Southern California amusement park.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: Tale about an unconventional sleuths attempts to find a football teams stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: While New York detectives Christopher Danson and PK Highsmith wow the city with their heroics, colleagues Allen Gamble and Terry Hoitz are the `other guys. Chained to their desks, forensic accountant Gamble and disgraced cop Hoitz are at each others throats when an unfortunate incident gives them the opportunity to prove themselves.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: Saturday Night
programme.desc: Tensions run high as producer Lorne Michaels and a ferocious troupe of young comedians and writers prepare for the first broadcast of "Saturday Night Live" on Oct. 11, 1975.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Anatomy of a Murder
programme.desc: Frederick Manion, an army lieutenant, is arrested for the murder of bartender, Barney Quill. In defence, he claims that the victim had beaten and raped his wife. With such evidence somewhat lacking, Manions lawyer, Paul Biegler attempts to save his defendant from prosecution, setting his assistants in search of witnesses.

programme.title: Birdy
programme.desc: A soldier returns from Vietnam to find his boyhood friend, also a fellow soldier, in a military hospital, having suffered a mental breakdown in which he has become detached from reality and imagines that he is a bird.

programme.title: Funny Girl
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Fanny Brice, who rose from obscurity to become one of Americas most beloved entertainers.

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: When a DJs sardonic exhortation to a late-night caller to wipe out a bar full of yuppies is taken literally, his world falls apart. Years later, on the point of suicide, he is saved by a similar casualty, a former medievalist whose wife was a victim of the bar bloodbath, and offered a chance for redemption by the mans quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Jamaican singer-songwriter Bob Marley overcomes adversity to become the most famous reggae musician in the world.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Whilst on leave, a Marine falls in love with a college student. The long-distance relationship is then tested when the Marine decides to re-enlist post-9/11.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: When his fathers job results in a family move to the countryside, young German boy Bruno misses his old friends. Roaming the grounds of the large country house he now calls home, he discovers the huge fenced facility that his dad Ralf, a Nazi officer, now manages. Approaching it, Bruno meets Shmuel, a fellow youngster on the other side of the barbed wire, wearing what appears to be a pair of pyjamas.

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: In Tokyo shooting a whisky commercial, middle-aged actor Bob Harris becomes attracted to Charlotte, the young wife of a celebrity photographer. Together they ride out their boredom of hotel life and their bewilderment of the city.

programme.title: Funny Girl
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Fanny Brice, who rose from obscurity to become one of Americas most beloved entertainers.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: A wisecracking parrot caged in a research lab tells his life story to a lonely janitor. Before coming to the science lab, he has passed through the hands of a succession of owners, from a petty criminal to a man who runs a parrot-dancing act. Touched by his colourful story, the janitor conspires to liberate the talking bird.

programme.title: It Takes Two
programme.desc: When a foster child meets the daughter of a bazillionaire, they hatch a plan to solve the problems in their life, and switch identities.

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A young kid teams up with the niece of young adult horror author R.L. Stine after the writers imaginary demons are set free on the town of Greendale, Maryland.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything theyve faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Look Whos Talking
programme.desc: Mollie is a pregnant woman whose partner has deserted her. When she goes into labour, friendly taxi driver James rushes her to hospital and the pair become firm friends. He slowly falls in love with her and her baby Mikey, but shes still looking for her perfect partner, not realising hes right under her nose. However we can hear Mikeys thoughts, and he wants James as his Dad.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Mildreds world is turned upside down when her estranged father, a washed-up magician, comes back to look after her and takes her camping to find the mythological Canterbury Panther.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sharkboy and Lavagirl
programme.desc: Dreamer Max, ridiculed by his classmates, conjures up his perfect dreamworld - the Planet Drool, but his dream is more powerful than even he suspects, and his favourite dream superheroes, Sharkboy and Lavagirl, materialise on Earth. They bring news that an alien intelligence is threatening his beloved Planet Drool. Is it true, as Sharkboy and Lavagirl say, that only Max can stop it?

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: The secretive Men in Black are agents charged with regulating the aliens who have settled on Earth and ensure that they remain undetected. New recruit J and his partner K must find and stop an intergalactic terrorist bent on assassinating two ambassadors from opposing galaxies before they can make peace.

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. An MIB agent turns to the only man who can help him save the world from a rampaging, shape-shifting alien which has taken on the outward appearance of a sexy lingerie model.

programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: Agent J goes back to the swinging 60s in a time-travelling mission to save his partner from a murderous alien.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Feeling guilty for getting Mrs. Krabappel suspended after one of his school pranks, Bart helps her escape detention and Ned Flanders winds up saving her life in the process.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: This customary Halloween episode features three spine-tingling tales. `War and Pieces sees Bart and Milhouse swap the joys of videogaming for the original delights of the board game, `Tweenlight focuses on Lisas infatuation with a fellow student/vampire and `Master and Cadaver sees Homer and Marge at sea on their second honeymoon.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: As Jan renovates the condo, Michael confronts his growing debt every way he can, which includes pressuring his employees for a loan. Pam and Jim spend a night out on Dwights family farm, now a bed and breakfast.

programme.title: The Office

programme.desc: Ned and Mare take a long road trip to interview a possible cult leader after Detrick backs out. Ken drags Nicole into his corporate apology tour, Oscar is driven mad by a troll commenting on his pieces, and Esmeralda is visited by an incubus.

programme.desc: Join Indias police force in action as they deal with criminal activities around the country in this dramatisation of real life crime stories, narrated by Anup Soni.

programme.title: C.I.D.

programme.title: Kill Me Tomorrow
programme.desc: A crime reporter tries to raise funds for his sons costly operation by doing a story about deadly diamond smugglers.

programme.title: Department Store

programme.title: Law of the Plainsman

programme.title: Look at Life
programme.desc: A look at the importance of the helicopter and its uses, both civil and military but also its failure to become a passenger carrier.

programme.title: Emergency Call
programme.desc: To save a young girls life, there is a frantic search for a rare blood. Only three people can be identified who are able to provide the blood, and each must be persuaded to make the donation despite reservations: a sailor about to depart for the Orient, a boxer in trouble for refusing to throw the big fight, and a murderer who has been a fugitive for 12 years.

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Sheep Dogs/Gun Collection. 1981. On a bitterly cold day, Jack Hargreaves travels to Wales for a sheep dog trial. Back in Hampshire he visits a collection of guns from the wild west of America.

programme.title: A Case for PC 49
programme.desc: A models scheme to murder a millionaire, with the intention of inheriting his fortune, is uncovered by a police constable.

programme.title: Marilyn
programme.desc: B movie-style tale of lust, greed and murder involving a handsome drifter, a promiscuous housewife and an unsuspecting husband.

programme.desc: The death of a woman is kept secret, leading the police into a life-or-death chase in the West Country.

programme.title: Poldark

programme.title: A Good Read: Sherlock Holmes

programme.title: Park Plaza 605
programme.desc: A private detective solves a murder, which he was accused of.

programme.title: Law and Disorder

programme.title: Conflict of Wings

programme.title: Patis Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati meets the young chefs behind one of Guadalajaras most exciting restaurants, Xokol. Back home, Pati invites her friend Francisco Migoya over to make conchas to go with pellizcadas with chicharron in salsa verde.

programme.title: Patis Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati visits the birthplace of Mexicos most famous spirit, the town of Tequila. Back home Pati makes a brunch of corn tortilla egg nests with salsa verde con chile de árbol and traditional arroz rojo.

programme.title: Patis Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati is in one of Mexicos most popular beach destinations - Puerto Vallarta. She gets an insiders tour of the best street food from one of the towns most acclaimed chefs, Thierry Boulet.

programme.title: Patis Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati celebrates everyones favorite Mexican creation, the taco. In her kitchen, Pati creates a pair of Jalisco-inspired tacos and a Ceviche tostada that are sure to satisfy any true taco-lover.

programme.title: Patis Mexican Table
programme.desc: Gualberto "Weber" Elizondo surprised his family when his grilling hobby turned him into a local celebrity and internet sensation. Meanwhile, chef Chuy Villareal of Cara De Vaca wants the world to know that the north of Mexico isnt just carne asada.

programme.title: Patis Mexican Table
programme.desc: Two sisters made a little shack on the Rio Ramos into a must-visit restaurant known for one dish: cortadillo stew. Down the road, another restaurant uses traditional stews in their famous empalmes.

programme.title: Patis Mexican Table
programme.desc: Nuevo Leon is divided between two pro soccer teams: Los Tigres and Los Rayados. Pati tries the food at each stadium with the teams stars to determine who wins in the battle of tortas vs tacos.

programme.desc: The Garza family invites Pati to their vineyard to help the community make piloncillo - and its hard work! Then, in the magic town of Bustamante, three sisters make traditional bread in adobe ovens.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde channels his inner sandwich lover by making an angry lobster club with pepper aioli and grilled bacon, a lamb birria torta with avocado and ramen consomme, and his an Italian beef combo with chili crisp cheese sauce, and giardiniera.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde shows us how he does Sunday up right as he grills up some Vietnamese Brisket with Rice Noodles, Crispy Swordfish Summer Rolls, and tops it all off with some tasty Soju Floats. Hey, its Sunday somewhere, right?

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Big Daddy Dale Talde shows you how to marinate, prep, and grill up the biggest and best steaks out there. From a Hanger Steak with Salsa Verde to a Ribeye with Ginger Chili Relish, and tops it all off with the father of all steaks? The Porterhouse.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.sub-title: Deluxe Dogs with Crusted Corn and Potatoes
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde puts a modern spin on a classic All-American cookout with his loaded hot dogs, spiced smashed potato salad, chorizo and corn nut crusted corn, and bangin banana pudding pops. Sparklers out for this spread!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.sub-title: Grilled Loco Moco and Huli Huli Chicken
programme.desc: The options are plentiful when Chef Dale smothers grilled Loco Moco with a mushroom gravy, salty and sweet Huli Huli Chicken with charred pineapple, and healthy scoops of Tuna Water Chestnut poke or mac salad.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde pulls out all the stops for this daddy-sized dinner. He grills up prime rib with herb and horseradish crust, lobster and chili sauce American, charred green beans with garlic tahini, and cheddar-stuffed parker house rolls.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde gets his beach vibes going with a grilled shrimp and lobster cocktail, clams with lemon breadcrumbs, a killer grilled king crab with burnt citrus butter, and a chilled mango frozen daiquiri. Dont you dare miss this beach party!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings your basic burgers to a new level with his dry-aged beef burger with potatoes and truffle dijon mayo, a part-beef part-pork belly burger with cheddar and an egg, and lastly a crispy mushroom tortilla burger with salsa and cheese.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.sub-title: Feast of Killer Crab and Perfect Pork Belly
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde prepares a finger food feast with char grilled chili crab, spiced adobo potatoes, grilled pork belly, and sofrito stuffed branzino all served on a bed of rice over banana leaves. Call your friends - this is a feast that will feed many!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Comforting and familiar but full of island flavor, right from the grill! Chef Dale roasts pork shoulder with chicharrones, steamy coconut rice and pigeon peas finished with frozen coconut rum drank with a charred banana.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat meets the trio behind Blood Bros BBQ to discover how three childhood friends seamlessly blended their Asian-American culture with the Texas barbecue traditions they grew up with.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat travels to the Emerald Coast of Destin, Florida, to join his friend Adam Evans on a spearfishing adventure, sourcing fresh fish to cook over live fire.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat visits Edgar Victoria, known for bringing the street foods of Mexico City to Nashville, to do some live fire cooking out in nature as they prepare one of his favorite dishes - skirt steak tlayuda.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat fishes the coastal inlets of Charleston, South Carolina, in search of a delicious sheepshead, which he plans to grill with his friend and chef James London.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: The Roscoe Family Legacy: Alabama Pit Ribs
programme.desc: Pat heads to Birmingham to team up with artist and chef Roscoe Hall, cooking ribs inspired by Roscoes family legacy.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: Hickory Smoked Virginia Ham and Mint Juleps
programme.desc: Pat Martin gets a history lesson on the origin of American barbecue from "The Professor" Tuffy Stone.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat Martin heads to the Cherokee National Forest for a day of fly fishing with an old friend, and to cook up their fresh catch over the campfire.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat and his pal Jason Stanhope meet up outside of Charleston for a day of quail hunting and grilling birds over live coals.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat Martin travels to Gainesboro, Tennessee to visit a free-range hog farm, learn about their operations, and grill up a less desired, but no less delicious, cut of hog - pork steaks.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: Red Curry Braised Pork with Mustard Greens
programme.desc: Pat Martin is in the frozen tundra of Minnesota to visit his new friend, Chef Yia Vang. They brave the cold and break nearly-frozen ground to barbecue a pigs head in the earth.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsays Road Trip
programme.desc: After four weeks on the road Ginos airing his feet in the back seat as the guys cruise along a Texan highway. Texas is a meat lovers paradise and Gordon is keen to show the Europhiles some of the best BBQ known to man.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsays Road Trip
programme.sub-title: Mamma Mia! Off We Go Again
programme.desc: Gordon, Gino and Fred travel to Greece to immerse themselves in the culinary traditions. The taste buddies go island-hopping, keen to learn more about the Mediterranean diet and how the country has one of the healthiest populations in the world.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsays Road Trip
programme.sub-title: Go Greek! Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: The boys are in the Greek capital Athens in a vintage VW campervan. This is where high-concept cuisine originated and is still being re-invented, in a city known as the birth place of democracy and the cradle of western civilisation.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsays Road Trip
programme.desc: Gordon, Gino and Fred start their road trip in Ginos homeland of Italy, where Gino needs help to pull off an event that is close to his heart. Gino collects Gordon and Fred in a campervan to begin a road trip they wont be forgetting in a hurry.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsays Road Trip
programme.desc: Gordon, Gino and Fred travel to France, where Fred has been asked to co-host an Oyster Festival in the beautiful Arcachon Bay, in just four days time. Reunited with their campervan, Fred nominates himself as the driver in his homeland.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsays Road Trip
programme.desc: The trio heads to Scotland as Gordon prepares to cook a feast for the chief of Clan Ramsay and his friends. Gordon shows the others how to dress like real Scotsmen as they go in search of Scottish beef, hunt for scallops and play some Highland Games.

programme.desc: Shivani Das, a young Asian newlywed, was attacked on a canal towpath and left for dead - and has been in a coma ever since. When it appears that a private investigator disappeared at the same time, the case deepens.

programme.title: Signora Volpe
programme.desc: Sylvia is abducted and fights for her own survival while Riva and her family race to find her.

programme.title: Whitstable Pearl
programme.desc: With her son grown, single mum Pearl pursues her lifelong dream and starts a private detective agency, which she runs from her family restaurant in the coastal town of Whitstable; locals soon flock to her with all kinds of cases.

programme.title: Whitstable Pearl
programme.desc: Pearl agrees to help a woman who received a note claiming her missing husband did not die from suicide; as Christmas approaches, Mike sinks into a depression, despite taking on a new flat in Whitstable.

programme.title: The Brokenwood Mysteries
programme.desc: Suspicions are aroused when a popular tennis star is found dead, following her hen party. The team are forced to plough through a tangled web of evidence, lies and deceit, to find the killer.

programme.title: Bergerac
programme.desc: Bergerac does not care how many cages he rattles in his quest to find kidnapped baby Lily before it is too late. Along the way, he clashes with Charlie Hungerford over Kims welfare.

programme.title: Rebus
programme.desc: Rebus is asked by his boss to head off a gangland war between two of Edinburghs notorious gangsters, and soon discovers evidence of an illegal operation to run prostitutes out of Bosnia and into Scotland. When Rebuss daughter is the victim of a hit-and-run accident, the finger points to one of Rebuss main suspects.

programme.title: Africa from Above
programme.desc: Explores the rich human and natural environments of South Africa, including visits to the countrys diverse coasts, sprawling urban settlements, huge railways, and even its extreme sport enthusiasts.

programme.title: Africa from Above
programme.desc: Beginning high above the Kenyan Highlands, head across the countrys vast savannahs, finally arriving at the turquoise waters of the Indian Ocean.

programme.title: Africa from Above
programme.desc: Explores Ghanas many natural and man-made wonders. Follows the Volta River as it flows from the Sahel savannahs, through fertile cocoa-laden hills at the heart of the nation, and across the biggest artificial lake in Africa.

programme.title: Africa from Above
programme.desc: Travels Ethiopia, the most populous landlocked country on Earth, to view its many sights. Highlights the work of communities that are planting trees to fight desertification and also visits Lake Tana, the countrys largest lake.

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Hayley has always wanted children but shes been anxious since her 20-week scan, which revealed that her baby has a congenital diaphragmatic hernia, an extremely rare type of hernia that occurs in one in 2,200 births. programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: An overtired Meadows crashes his car, narrowly avoiding a masked man, who flees after discovering Meadows is a police officer. However, the traffic unit dont believe Meadows account of events, and his career could be over unless he can prove his story. Elsewhere, Keane and Fletcher are called to investigate a fire on an industrial estate, and end up uncovering what seems to be a terrorist network.

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Leela and Tony discover the body of murdered supermodel Cindy Statham. A video which links her to an anti-fur campaign leads Jo and Stuart to her former minder Ben Henley. Jack has Mickey follow up the possibility of a love triangle, as investigations show that Cindy called her ex-boyfriend on the night of the murder. Then an X-rated film is found in Cindys house containing footage of missing 15-year-old runaway Serena Black.

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: The prime suspect in the Cindy Statham case is now Larry Franks, an obsessive stalker, but in a further twist, CCTV footage reveals evidence of Cindys half-brother screaming at her in a restaurant on the day she died. Elsewhere, Leela surprises an intruder in her flat and is beaten up. Then, Smithy discovers a bag of heroin in Leelas spare room - she tells him that her friend Shane has been staying with her.

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Sun Hill and Barton Street join forces to police a football match. Terry is undercover in a pub near the stadium to attempt an arrest on Justin Young - a supplier of illegally imported goods, but when a fight breaks out, Terry finds himself alone with Justin in the cellar - and an officer is brutally stabbed. Elsewhere, Tony and Lewis are stopped in their patrol car by a desperate woman who begs them to help her husband.

programme.title: The Bill

programme.desc: Pete meets the four-legged friends that call the UKs leading dog welfare charity, Dogs Trust, home. From when they are rescued, Pete plays an instrumental role in their rehabilitation process, right up until the point the dogs are safely rehomed.

programme.desc: Older parents Nina and Andy already had two children and thought their `nappy days were behind them, when they discovered they were pregnant with twins Phoebe and Zac.

programme.title: One Born: What Happened Next?
programme.desc: When `One Born first met Charlie and Dan, Charlie had recently given birth to identical twin girls. programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on a rail journey through Germany, steered by a Bradshaws Continental Railway Guide published in 1936. His unique window on Europe between the world wars takes him through a tumultuous period in German history, when the nations first democracy and its vibrant culture of art, design and decadence were swept away by fascism, nationalism and the increasing likelihood of war.

programme.desc: The final programme in the series documenting the life of Bolton steeplejack Fred Dibnah sees him contemplating his future and the possibility of retirement.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Made in Britain
programme.desc: Fred reaches Cumbria where iron ore was once mined on a large scale, and enjoys the Lake District on a friends steam boat and its then on to the Florence Mine at Egremont and the Workington Steel Works.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Made in Britain
programme.desc: Fred and his steersman Alf travel up to Scotland where they marvel at the ingenuity of the Falkirk wheel and visit one of the few surviving traditional iron works left in the region.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Age of Steam
programme.desc: A look at the extraordinary expansion of industrial Britain in the 18th century, and at the continued use of huge stationary steam engines in mills, collieries and steel works until the 20th century.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Age of Steam
programme.desc: Fred Dibnah looks at early experiments in the use of steam for road transport, and at the development of the traction engine for use in agriculture and road haulage.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Age of Steam
programme.desc: A look at how steam revolutionised shipping, from the earliest paddle steamers with screw propellers to more modern vessels like the Royal Yacht Britannia.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Age of Steam
programme.desc: A look at the major advances made with the invention of the steam turbine, still used today to generate electricity in coal-fired and nuclear power stations, and Britains steam heritage.

programme.title: Aa Ab Laut Chalen
programme.desc: In a situation remarkably similar to present-day Britain, graduates in 1990s India found that education was no guarantee of employment. Unable to get work in Delhi, Rohan decides to try his luck in New York. When he gets there, he finds himself homeless, jobless and desperate. Two taxi drivers - an Indian and a Pakistani - take him in and help him find work. He meets Pooja, who soon develops feelings for him.
